679910.name: Meawja
679910.description: Meawja is an action platform game with pixel-art graphics where you take the role of a black cat. Your objective is to face the Master's Trials in order to become a ninja. You will slash and cut your way through caves, dungeons, deserts and more, all this with colorful retro graphics inspired by classic SNES games. In this arduous journey, you'll meet friends and foes while facing numerous dangers to prove your worth.
679910.supported_languages: 英语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 俄语
